title: IEI: ETF Inflow Alert - Nasdaq.com
text: Looking today at week-over-week shares outstanding changes among the universe of ETFs covered at ETF Channel , one standout is the iShares 3-7 Year Treasury Bond ETF (Symbol: IEI) where we have detected an approximate $268.8 million dollar inflow -- that's a 3.6% increase week over week in outstanding units (from 58,900,000 to 61,000,000). The chart below shows the one year price performance of IEI, versus its 200 day moving average:
